00053 void ezradio_reset(void)
00054 {
00055     /* Initialize ustimer */
00056     USTIMER_Init();
00057     /* Put radio in shutdown */
00058     ezradio_hal_AssertShutdown();
00059     /* Delay for 20us */
00060     USTIMER_Delay( 10u );
00061     /* Release radio from shutdown */
00062     ezradio_hal_DeassertShutdown();
00063     /* Delay for 100us */
00064     USTIMER_Delay( 100u );
00065     /* Clear CTS signal. */
00066     ezradio_comm_ClearCTS();
00067     /* Deinit ustimer */
00068     USTIMER_DeInit();
00069 }
00070 
00079 void ezradio_power_up(uint8_t boot_options, uint8_t xtal_options, uint32_t xo_freq)
00080 {
00081     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00082     uint8_t ezradioCmd[7u];
00083 
00084     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_POWER_UP;
00085     ezradioCmd[1] = boot_options;
00086     ezradioCmd[2] = xtal_options;
00087     ezradioCmd[3] = (uint8_t)(xo_freq >> 24);
00088     ezradioCmd[4] = (uint8_t)(xo_freq >> 16);
00089     ezradioCmd[5] = (uint8_t)(xo_freq >> 8);
00090     ezradioCmd[6] = (uint8_t)(xo_freq);
00091 
00092     ezradio_comm_SendCmd( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_POWER_UP, ezradioCmd );
00093 }

00100 void ezradio_part_info(ezradio_cmd_reply_t *ezradioReply)
00101 {
00102     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00103     uint8_t ezradioCmd[EZRADIO_CMD_REPLY_COUNT_PART_INFO];
00104 
00105     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_PART_INFO;
00106 
00107     ezradio_comm_SendCmdGetResp( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_PART_INFO,
00108                               ezradioCmd,
00109                               EZRADIO_CMD_REPLY_COUNT_PART_INFO,
00110                               ezradioCmd );
00111     ezradioReply->PART_INFO.CHIPREV         = ezradioCmd[0];
00112     ezradioReply->PART_INFO.PART            = (((uint16_t)ezradioCmd[1] << 8) & 0xFF00) +
00113                                                 ((uint16_t)ezradioCmd[2] & 0x00FF);
00114     ezradioReply->PART_INFO.PBUILD          = ezradioCmd[3];
00115     ezradioReply->PART_INFO.ID              = (((uint16_t)ezradioCmd[4] << 8) & 0xFF00) +
00116                                                 ((uint16_t)ezradioCmd[5] & 0x00FF);
00117     ezradioReply->PART_INFO.CUSTOMER        = ezradioCmd[6];
00118     ezradioReply->PART_INFO.ROMID           = ezradioCmd[7];
00119 }

00127 void ezradio_start_tx(uint8_t channel, uint8_t condition, uint16_t tx_len)
00128 {
00129     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00130     uint8_t ezradioCmd[7u];
00131 
00132     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_START_TX;
00133     ezradioCmd[1] = channel;
00134     ezradioCmd[2] = condition;
00135     ezradioCmd[3] = (uint8_t)(tx_len >> 8);
00136     ezradioCmd[4] = (uint8_t)(tx_len);
00137     ezradioCmd[5] = 0x00;
00138 
00139     // Don't repeat the packet, 
00140     // ie. transmit the packet only once
00141     ezradioCmd[6] = 0x00;
00142 
00143     ezradio_comm_SendCmd( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_START_TX, ezradioCmd );
00144 }
00145 
00156  void ezradio_start_rx(uint8_t channel, uint8_t condition, uint16_t rx_len, uint8_t next_state1, uint8_t next_state2, uint8_t next_state3)
00157 {
00158     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00159     uint8_t ezradioCmd[8u];
00160     
00161     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_START_RX;
00162     ezradioCmd[1] = channel;
00163     ezradioCmd[2] = condition;
00164     ezradioCmd[3] = (uint8_t)(rx_len >> 8);
00165     ezradioCmd[4] = (uint8_t)(rx_len);
00166     ezradioCmd[5] = next_state1;
00167     ezradioCmd[6] = next_state2;
00168     ezradioCmd[7] = next_state3;
00169 
00170     ezradio_comm_SendCmd( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_START_RX, ezradioCmd );
00171 }

00220 void ezradio_gpio_pin_cfg(uint8_t gpio0, uint8_t gpio1, uint8_t gpio2, uint8_t gpio3, uint8_t nirq, uint8_t sdo, uint8_t gen_config,
00221     ezradio_cmd_reply_t *ezradioReply)
00222 {
00223     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00224     uint8_t ezradioCmd[EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_GPIO_PIN_CFG];
00225 
00226     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_GPIO_PIN_CFG;
00227     ezradioCmd[1] = gpio0;
00228     ezradioCmd[2] = gpio1;
00229     ezradioCmd[3] = gpio2;
00230     ezradioCmd[4] = gpio3;
00231     ezradioCmd[5] = nirq;
00232     ezradioCmd[6] = sdo;
00233     ezradioCmd[7] = gen_config;
00234 
00235     ezradio_comm_SendCmdGetResp( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_GPIO_PIN_CFG,
00236                               ezradioCmd,
00237                               EZRADIO_CMD_REPLY_COUNT_GPIO_PIN_CFG,
00238                               ezradioCmd );
00239 
00240     ezradioReply->GPIO_PIN_CFG.gpIO[0]        = ezradioCmd[0];
00241     ezradioReply->GPIO_PIN_CFG.gpIO[1]        = ezradioCmd[1];
00242     ezradioReply->GPIO_PIN_CFG.gpIO[2]        = ezradioCmd[2];
00243     ezradioReply->GPIO_PIN_CFG.gpIO[3]        = ezradioCmd[3];
00244     ezradioReply->GPIO_PIN_CFG.NIRQ         = ezradioCmd[4];
00245     ezradioReply->GPIO_PIN_CFG.SDO          = ezradioCmd[5];
00246     ezradioReply->GPIO_PIN_CFG.GEN_CONFIG   = ezradioCmd[6];
00247 }

00261 void ezradio_set_property( uint8_t group, uint8_t num_props, uint8_t start_prop, ... )
00262 {
00263     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00264     uint8_t ezradioCmd[16u];
00265     
00266     va_list argList;
00267     uint8_t cmdIndex;
00268 
00269     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_SET_PROPERTY;
00270     ezradioCmd[1] = group;
00271     ezradioCmd[2] = num_props;
00272     ezradioCmd[3] = start_prop;
00273 
00274     va_start (argList, start_prop);
00275     cmdIndex = 4;
00276     while(num_props--)
00277     {
00278         ezradioCmd[cmdIndex] = (uint8_t)va_arg (argList, int);
00279         cmdIndex++;
00280     }
00281     va_end(argList);
00282 
00283     ezradio_comm_SendCmd( cmdIndex, ezradioCmd );
00284 }

00297     ezradioCmd[1] = next_state1;
00298 
00299     ezradio_comm_SendCmd( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_CHANGE_STATE, ezradioCmd );
00300 }

00626     ezradioReply->GET_MODEM_STATUS.AFC_FREQ_OFFSET |= (uint16_t)ezradioCmd[7] & 0x00FF;

00663 void ezradio_get_packet_info(uint8_t field_number_mask, uint16_t len, int16_t diff_len, ezradio_cmd_reply_t *ezradioReply)
00664 {
00665     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00666     uint8_t ezradioCmd[EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_PACKET_INFO];
00667     
00668     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_PACKET_INFO;
00669     ezradioCmd[1] = field_number_mask;
00670     ezradioCmd[2] = (uint8_t)(len >> 8);
00671     ezradioCmd[3] = (uint8_t)(len);
00672     // the different of the byte, althrough it is signed, but to command hander
00673     // it can treat it as unsigned
00674     ezradioCmd[4] = (uint8_t)((uint16_t)diff_len >> 8);
00675     ezradioCmd[5] = (uint8_t)(diff_len);
00676 
00677     ezradio_comm_SendCmdGetResp( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_PACKET_INFO,
00678                               ezradioCmd,
00679                               EZRADIO_CMD_REPLY_COUNT_PACKET_INFO,
00680                               ezradioCmd );
00681 
00682     ezradioReply->PACKET_INFO.LENGTH = ((uint16_t)ezradioCmd[0] << 8) & 0xFF00;
00683     ezradioReply->PACKET_INFO.LENGTH |= (uint16_t)ezradioCmd[1] & 0x00FF;
00684 }
00685 
00686

00688  * Faster versions of the above commands. 
00689  */
00690 
00694 void ezradio_start_tx_fast( void )
00695 {
00696     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00697     uint8_t ezradioCmd[1u];
00698     
00699     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_START_TX;
00700 
00701     ezradio_comm_SendCmd( 1u, ezradioCmd );
00702 }

00906 void ezradio_fifo_info_fast_reset(uint8_t fifo)
00907 {
